name: mistiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being misty (= with small drops of water in the air which make it difficult to see into the distance): She could hardly see where sea and sky met far away in the soft grey mistiness. the greyish-creamy mistiness of a cold, hazy morning
the quality of being uncertain or difficult to see or understand: He let himself slip away into the mistiness of sleep. The sun was beating down and there was a sort of mistiness in my head. See
misty
More examplesFewer examplesa journey through the early-morning mistiness of the valleyWith grey overcast sky and slight mistiness we set out mid-morning.the releasing of our minds from doubts and mistiness
